name: Journey Around City: Driving C
description:
Journey Around City: Driving Car is professional driver prepare yourself for driving test in city driving. Gets ready to play parking simulator. When driving in the city roads, focus your spirit to the speed racing. With traffic around you need to be careful while driving. This extreme adventures driving game will let you the experience the thrill of pro driving, parking reloaded and simulation.
Features
- Many different vehicles available to unlock and customize!
- Play third-person mode and exit vehicle!
- Smooth car handling
- Realistic damage system.
- Stop at the gas stations and refill
- Buttons, tilt and wheel steering options
